name: SSF10
title: Site-Specific Factor 10
subtitle: Clark Level
notes: **Note:**   Code the Clark level as documented in the pathology report.
rows:
Clark level I
In situ, intraepidermal, intraepithelial, noninvasive 
Basement membrane of epidermis is intact

Clark level II
Papillary dermis invaded

Clark level III
Papillary-reticular dermal interface invaded

Clark level IV
Reticular dermis invaded

Clark level V
Subcutaneous tissue invaded (through entire dermis)
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
No histologic examination of primary site

Unknown Clark level or no information
Not documented in patient record
